conclusion: Determine which container the liquid will flow into after passing through baffles from points A, B, C, and D.
Liquid flows down and encounters the first baffle (black line) directing it to the left.
Liquid continues flowing down and encounters the second baffle (white line) directing it further to the left.
Liquid flows into container E from point A.

Liquid continues flowing down and encounters the second baffle (white line) directing it further to the right.

Liquid flows into container G from point D.
Final answer: Liquid from points A and B will flow into container E; liquid from points C and D will flow into container G.
